abstracts.cdata!:
The request for Inspection was submitted
            by AFROPROCA - Association pour la Formation, la Production
            des ouvrages de carrieres et la lutte contre le SIDA sur les
            chantiers a haute intensite de main d'oeuvre - and its
            legal representatives. The requesters believe that their
            rights and interests have been harmed because of violations
            of Bank Policies and Procedures, namely concerning project
            supervision (OP/BP 13.05), concerning procurement (OP/BP
            11.00), and on violations of Bank guidelines on procurement
            under Bank loans and credits, and, concerning the selection,
            and employment of consultants by Bank Borrowers. The
            requesters also assert that on several occasions they
            informed, and exchanged correspondence with the Bank, and
            the Government of Burundi, finding no attempt to remedy the
            situation. Requesters consider Bank's actions and
            omissions, to be contrary to its Policies and Procedures,
            and therefore request the Panel to recommend an investigation.
